genre: ['Phim Kinh Dị', 'Phim Gây Cấn', 'Phim Chính Kịch']
language: Tiếng Tây Ban Nhà kiểu Cax-ti-le
overview: During the World Cup final between Argentina and Holland, in times of military dictatorship, a group of torturers kidnap a group of young people. What begins as an inhumane interrogation turns into hell: the wrong group has been kidnapped.
